1.0.name: wordpress/category-text
1.0.description:
Category Text add a widget that allow to add arbitrary text or HTML code, different for each category of your blog. It's very usefull for SEO, because you can make different text for different category, so also different banner etc. Now you can select also the home page position.

The plugin born from idea of Vanny Rosso for his blog Fantagiochi
